#This is a vignette for Package3 that creates a plot of ARID1A mutation per tumor type.

##It's based on the data from Tumor Portal downloaded on July 18, 2016.


```{r}
library(Package3)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
pplot(ARID1A)
```
